channel.title: creativity on Adrienne Franke
channel.description: Recent content in creativity on Adrienne Franke

item.title: It's Hard to Commit to Creative Pursuits
item.description: I love music. It’s been a big part of my life since I was little. First, I begrudgingly learned piano. Then I moved on to the guitar. Eventually I learned the bass, the drums, the upright bass (classical), and a couple more instruments. Long story short, I have been playing music for nearly two decades and I know a whole band’s worth of instruments decently well. It’s easier than ever to record, produce, and release music as an independent musician nowadays.
